about.heading: About Taisiya
about.biography: I am a hairdresser with over 3 years of experience, helping people express themselves through their style. My passion is to help clients feel confident and stylish.
about.philosophy: every client deserves to feel confident and amazing, whether it’s a fresh haircut or maintaining their favorite style.
about.certificate1: Certificate from an International Academy of Style (2022)

womenHaircuts.title: Women's Haircuts
womenHaircuts.description: Refresh your look with a personalized haircut designed to highlight your features and hair type. Whether you want a trendy style or a simple trim — we guarantee confidence and shine.
womenHaircuts.features: Women's haircuts, trimming ends, individual consultation, style advice.

menHaircuts.title: Men's Haircuts
menHaircuts.description: Experience precision and style with our men's haircuts, crafted according to your personality and lifestyle. Classic or modern — we ensure a fresh, neat appearance.
menHaircuts.features: Precise edging, clipper or scissor haircut, optional beard trim.

rootColoring.title: Root Coloring
rootColoring.description: Enhance your style with root coloring. Perfect for maintaining natural or refreshed hair color.
rootColoring.features: Root coloring, shade selection, post-color care.

fullColoring.title: Full Hair Coloring
fullColoring.description: Transform your look completely with full hair coloring. High-quality dye and professional application guarantee a vibrant, rich color.
fullColoring.features: Full hair coloring, custom shade, hair structure protection.

toning.title: Hair Toning
toning.description: Balance the hair color after coloring or highlighting. Toning adds shine and intensity to the color.
toning.features: Color balance, enhance tone, shine and brightness.

balayage.title: Balayage / Highlights
balayage.description: Create natural color transitions with balayage. Hair looks voluminous and shiny.
balayage.features: Natural color transitions, volume, shine, stylish effect.

polishing.title: Hair Polishing
polishing.description: Refresh your hair without losing length! Polishing removes split ends along the entire length, giving hair incredible smoothness and care.
polishing.features: Split end removal, shine enhancement, breakage prevention, perfect smoothness.

galleryItems.womenHaircuts: Various stylish women haircuts for all hair types
galleryItems.menHaircuts: Classic and modern men haircuts, precision and style
galleryItems.rootColoring: Root coloring for a fresh and even tone
galleryItems.fullColoring: Full hair coloring for a bright and vivid result
galleryItems.toning: Hair toning for the desired shade and shine
galleryItems.balayage: Balayage for a natural color transition and volume
galleryItems.polishing: Removing split ends for smooth and well-groomed hair

main.greeting: Welcome to TaisiyaStyle - where every haircut becomes a masterpiece!

offer2.title: Loyalty Program for Regular Clients
offer2.description: Become a regular client and get discounts on all services!

offer3.description: Bring a friend and get a bonus for your next visit!
